I had the pleasure of spending a week at the Sheraton Gandaria in Jakarta, and it was one of the best hotel experiences I have ever had at a hotel chain. As a business traveler and a loyalist of the Marriott brand who have stayed at many hotels, my recent stay at the Sheraton Jakarta Gandaria ranks number one for its location and the ‚Äòsuperb‚Äô customer service. The hotel is conveniently connected to a mall, security guards at every entrance/exit, and a club lounge on the 20th floor. Upon arrival on the first day, I was greeted with smiles and a team eager to assist and make my weeklong stay comfortable. The 20th floor club lounge is run and managed by Ms. Meilani Tambunan who greets all with her beautiful smile and so much care. Meilani runs the lounge like a well oiled machine. Breakfast, snacks, and dinner is served daily from the 20th floor club lounge. There were many delicious food options from western to eastern dishes. My elderly mother (‚ÄúMama‚Äù) in law, who has osteoarthritis, was well taken great of by Meilani and her team. Every morning, they made sure Mama had plenty to eat and drink, assisted her at the food buffet, and always made sure her needs were met. Chef Zila and Fikri often came by at breakfast to share the daily specials and even brought assorted dishes from the kitchen for us to try. Our tummies were always so full and satisfied. We were greeted every morning with smiles from a dedicated team. They were there for Mama and took care of her when I had to depart the hotel before Mama. Meilani took great care of Mama, organized her transportation to the airport, and frequently checked in on Mama to make sure my elderly mother-in-law was well. I am so appreciative of this team who went above and beyond to create a hotel stay that felt like ‚Äúhome away from home.‚Äù The staff‚Äôs attention to details and just how thoughtful and caring they were to my Mama and I meant so much to me. We also booked 2 spa treatments, and the massages were easily one of the best massages that I have ever had. Susan and Rita (massage therapists) had healing hands! It was hard leaving after a week because I felt as though I was leaving good friends and a family behind from Indonesia. The staff strives for excellence, and you will be spoiled here. Thank you -- Meilani, Puja, Fikri, Chef Febri, Chef BaZila, Alif, Akhsa, Theresia, Faral, Danang, Rahmat, Salma, Aliah, and Rahma.

An Unpleasant Experience at the Pool Area I stayed at Sheraton and had the opportunity to use the swimming pool while wearing activewear (a sports top and fairly tight leggings). The outfit felt comfortable and, in my opinion, was still appropriate. However, I also understood that it might not fully align with the dress code, so before entering, I asked the female staff member at the sports gate whether it was allowed. She mentioned no restrictions and allowed me to enter without issue. While I was swimming, the same staff member approached me and said that my outfit was ‚Äúnot allowed because a platinum member had complained.‚Äù I immediately apologized and said I would get out of the pool right away. But she continued, saying, ‚ÄúThis is a warning from a platinum member. They‚Äôre a regular guest here and said you shouldn‚Äôt be wearing that.‚Äù At that point, I felt quite cornered. The ‚Äúplatinum member‚Äù status was mentioned repeatedly, as if that alone justified the reprimand ‚Äî not because of any clearly communicated hotel policy. I was disappointed with how the message was delivered. If there are specific rules regarding swimwear, staff should communicate them objectively and consistently based on hotel policy. We fully understand that hotels have their own rules, but in this case, the staff based the reprimand on a guest complaint and their loyalty status, which felt inappropriate. I believe that every guest, regardless of membership status, deserves to be treated with courtesy and professionalism. I hope Sheraton can improve internal communication and service standards so that all guests ‚Äî regardless of membership tier ‚Äî feel respected and treated fairly.

This review is geared more for BonVoy Elite members but I'm sure everyone can benefit from it . BLUF, this is the best bang for your buck 5 star hotel as BonVoy Elite members! Check out the reviews on Marriott app and you'll see Sheraton Gandaria is just under Ritz Carlton and St Regis. However , those two costs hundreds of dollars more. You also have to pay extra for Ritz lounge and Regis does not have club lounge. Yes it's quite far from the airport and city center, but spend an extra $5to $10on grab or taxi and you would be pleasantly surprised by how much more youd be rewarded. I met visitors from Japan and Singapore who also echoed my sentiment. This is the second time I stay. Last time was a birthday treat for my mother and this time is for my dad. We stay in the Executive Suite for 5 days. I was thoroughly impressed especially by the culinary treats. Normally you would see menu repeats after 3 to 4 days. However, at day 5, Sheraton Gandaria still serves new delectable menu at breakfast and Hors d'oeuvres. Barramundi sashimi, ox tail soup, lobster bisque, roast duck, fish curry, etc. the delicacies never end. I initially planned to check out few restaurants at the adjoining mall but by day 3 it became unnecessary. The endless culinary adventure absolutely beats Ritz, Regis, 4 seasons, Westin etc and i had stayed in these hotels in Doha, Athens, Aspen, Dubai, San Fransico. Sheraton Grand Gandaria City is absolutely world class. The suite, service, check in process, free parking and access to mall is unparalleled. I got to see a movie or two on iMax and get few shoppings done as well. In the rare chance you're not satisfied with the hotel restaurants, then youre a hop away from dozens of local, western and eastern specialty restaurants in the mall 1st, 2nd and top floors. The pool and gym are just as nice as the service. The adjoining mall has literally everything from grocery, medicine, food, golf clubs, shoes, to high end electronics and even drones! You would spend days here without the need to get anything from outside! Thank you Chef Husain, Agung, and Tedi! You guys really spoiled me! The coffee ground rub dry aged Filet Mignon was exquisite! I have not tasted anything like that before. The oxtail soup was as delectable as last year. The dosa was surprisingly really good, a testament to Marriott chef exchange program. And thank you for the crispy crepe to go. It was better than the one I had in Brussels! Thank you Susan for the great massage and for taking your time with my dad. You are a seasoned pro and I highly recommend the spa massages for anyone to delight in! Thank you Farel and Meilano. Your hospitality and professionalism truly shine! Thank you for providing the information for trip to Labuan Bajo too. Please thank the bartenders who made custom White Russian with rum and Kahlua. Those were great! Thank you Fadol, Fandy, Salma, Salsa, Kheyla, Syita for decorating the room. Dad was happy and took many pictures. Thank you Satria and Nadiva for the extra coffee in the room and the cute towel animal arts. Mom was very impressed and took pictures.

Updating the review from 2022. We stayed again in Oct 2024 and were absolutely amazed by the service level at this hotel. We were treated with the utmost courtesy and warmth from the minute we stepped out of the Silverbird. The staff has made every effort to make our stay enjoyable since, and for a 10-day stay that makes a world of difference. Thit time we enjoyed a suite and it was fantastic. All team members here make an effort to make your stay perfect. And it was. This is our new home away from home. Review from 2022: The Sheraton Grand Jakarta is located in the Gandaria City mall. The hotel has valet parking and direct access to the mall. All entrances to the hotel feature metal detectors and security staff, as well as xray equipment for purses and bags. The hotel was built in 2015 and features standard rooms from 38 sqm to 45 sqm, a lobby lounge, restaurants, a big gym and large outside pool area, and conference facilities. The reception area is very open and organized and directly opposite the reception is the lobby lounge and bar and a small counter where you can buy sandwiches and sweet snacks. We reviewed the lobby lounge separately. The hotel rooms are nice, with all the amenities you would expect. The bathroom isn‚Äôt very big but is well designed. The air condition is difficult to adjust, at least in our room. Even though it seems like the fan speed can be adjusted, it is operating at a high speed continuously, and it gets a bit tricky to control the temperature, after a while it is possible to get a nice climate in the room. The street noise is pretty loud, at least on the 9th floor where we were staying. It didn‚Äôt bother us much but if you are a light sleeper it might. Motorcycles are very loud in Jakarta and the traffic outside is intense pretty much all day and all night. The bed is very comfortable and so are the pillows and comforter. We slept incredibly well. We liked the mall access as it increases the dining options significantly when staying at this hotel. The gym is very good and features all the equipment you could possibly need, all very modern and well maintained. There is hand sanitizer throughout the gym and also sanitizer wipes. Towels and water are of course also provided. The staff is friendly and professional, and all our requests were met with a smile and a strong will to accommodate our requests. We enjoyed staying at the Sheraton Grand Jakarta Gandaria City and will consider it our preferred hotel at our next stay in Jakarta.

My stay at Sheraton Grand Jakarta, Gandaria City, in the King Suite, offered a harmonious blend of indulgence and subtle nuances within this urban retreat, secured at the rate of Rp3,865,708. Suite Serenity: The King Suite at Sheraton Grand Jakarta unfolded as a generously spacious haven, ensuring a luxurious and comfortable retreat within the vibrant urban landscape of Jakarta. The room's expansive dimensions contributed to an enhanced sense of comfort, while the carefully curated amenities added a touch of opulence to the overall experience. Artistry and Luxe in the Lounge: A standout highlight of the stay was undoubtedly the Executive Lounge, an exquisitely designed space that seamlessly blended artistic flair with a luxurious ambiance. The lounge experience was elevated by the exceptional quality of coffee, and both the breakfast and dinner offerings showcased culinary excellence, providing guests with a refined and delightful dining experience. Dated Quarters and Divergent Vibes: While the King Suite exuded comfort, a discernible downside was the perceptible aging of certain elements within the room, contributing to a sense of dated charm. However, the Executive Lounge, with its opulent design and culinary offerings, stood as a stark contrast, creating a divergence in ambiance between the accommodation and the common areas. Crowded Lobby Dynamics: Navigating through the lobby proved to be a bustling and dynamic experience, with a discernible crowd adding to the vibrant atmosphere. The presence of numerous events within the hotel premises might explain the lively lobby dynamics. While this vibrancy contributes to the hotel's dynamic character, it might be overwhelming for those seeking a more serene check-in or check-out process. In summary, Sheraton Grand Jakarta, Gandaria City, provided a stay marked by nuanced experiences. The King Suite, with its expansive dimensions, offered a luxurious retreat, although some elements hinted at aging. The Executive Lounge, a culinary and artistic haven, stood out despite a contrast in ambiance. The bustling lobby dynamics, while dynamic, added layers of complexity to the overall stay, contributing to the hotel's vibrant character.

Pengalaman Tidak Menyenangkan di Area Kolam Renang Saya menginap di Sheraton dan berkesempatan menggunakan kolam renang sambil mengenakan pakaian aktif (atasan olahraga dan legging yang cukup ketat). Pakaiannya terasa nyaman dan menurut saya masih pantas. Namun, saya juga memahami bahwa hal tersebut mungkin tidak sepenuhnya sesuai dengan aturan berpakaian, jadi sebelum masuk, saya bertanya kepada anggota staf wanita di gerbang olahraga apakah hal tersebut diperbolehkan. Dia menyebutkan tidak ada batasan dan mengizinkan saya masuk tanpa masalah. Saat aku sedang berenang, anggota staf yang sama mendekatiku dan mengatakan bahwa pakaianku ‚Äútidak diperbolehkan karena ada anggota platinum yang mengeluh.‚Äù Saya segera meminta maaf dan berkata saya akan segera keluar dari kolam. Namun dia melanjutkan, Ini adalah peringatan dari anggota platinum. Mereka adalah tamu tetap di sini dan mengatakan kamu tidak boleh memakai itu. Pada saat itu, saya merasa sangat terpojok. Status ‚Äúanggota platinum‚Äù disebutkan berulang kali, seolah-olah itu saja yang membenarkan teguran tersebut ‚Äî bukan karena kebijakan hotel yang dikomunikasikan dengan jelas. Saya kecewa dengan cara pesan itu disampaikan. Jika terdapat peraturan khusus mengenai pakaian renang, staf harus mengkomunikasikannya secara objektif dan konsisten berdasarkan kebijakan hotel. Kami memahami sepenuhnya bahwa hotel memiliki aturannya sendiri, namun dalam kasus ini, staf mendasarkan teguran tersebut pada keluhan tamu dan status loyalitas mereka, yang dirasa tidak pantas. Saya percaya bahwa setiap tamu, apapun status keanggotaannya, berhak diperlakukan dengan sopan dan profesional. Saya berharap Sheraton dapat meningkatkan standar komunikasi dan layanan internal sehingga semua tamu ‚Äî terlepas dari tingkat keanggotaannya ‚Äî merasa dihormati dan diperlakukan secara adil.

Pelayanannya sangat buruk, hotelnya sangat buruk dalam hal pelayanan, kartu kredit Vietnam tidak bisa digunakan, tetapi uangnya tetap dipotong dari rekening kartu saya dan kemudian staf menanganinya dengan buruk.

Sungguh memalukan dan sangat mengecewakan. Berikut terjemahan teks Anda ke dalam bahasa Inggris yang fasih dan profesional: Penginapan yang Benar-Benar Memalukan dan Mengecewakan Penginapan saya baru-baru ini di Sheraton Gandaria City sungguh memalukan dan mengecewakan. Saya tiba larut malam untuk check-in, tetapi merasa sama sekali tidak dikenali dan tidak dihargai oleh staf resepsionis, terutama Shafina. Saat check-in, saya diberitahu bahwa tidak ada kamar suite yang tersedia‚Äîhanya kamar yang lebih besar yang diperuntukkan bagi perokok, dan selain itu hanya kamar standar yang saya pesan sebelumnya. Karena penasaran, saya memeriksa aplikasi Marriott dan melihat bahwa kamar Suite ternyata tersedia. Ketika saya bertanya lagi, ia menjawab bahwa mungkin ada ketidakcocokan antara aplikasi dan ketersediaan sebenarnya. Tidak masalah. Tetapi kemudian saya memeriksa lagi dan melihat bahwa bahkan kamar di atas Junior Suite pun tersedia. Ketika saya bertanya tentang itu, ia mengatakan saya bisa menginap di salah satunya dengan tambahan Rp2,5 juta‚Äîtetapi ia bisa menawarkan diskon 50%, sehingga menjadi Rp1,25 juta. Saya menolak dan memutuskan untuk melanjutkan dengan kamar saya yang lama. Saya bahkan menekankan bahwa saya adalah Anggota Titanium, dan dia menjawab bahwa Anggota Titanium hanya berhak atas peningkatan hingga Junior Suite. Hal ini menimbulkan pertanyaan serius‚Äîmengapa Anggota Titanium diperlakukan seperti ini? Bukankah salah satu manfaat utama status Titanium Elite adalah peningkatan gratis, termasuk ke suite, jika tersedia? Jadi, yang mana? Apakah suite hanya tersedia dengan biaya tambahan, atau memang tidak tersedia? Rasanya tidak konsisten, terutama karena teman saya pernah mendapatkan peningkatan ke Presidential Suite, dan saya sendiri pernah mendapatkan peningkatan ke Presidential Suite di lokasi Sheraton lainnya. Mungkinkah karena saya menggunakan poin kali ini sehingga saya dibatasi? Jika ya, apa gunanya menjadi bagian dari Marriott Bonvoy? Apakah kita mendapatkan poin tanpa benar-benar menginap? Jika tidak, mengapa status saya tidak dihormati? Kunjungan ini sungguh mengecewakan. Bahkan tidak ada kartu ucapan selamat datang yang menyatakan Keanggotaan Elite saya. Kerja bagus‚Äîtidak akan ada kunjungan berikutnya.

Ini sebagai tanggapan atas tawaran makan gratis untuk 4 orang. Kami berdua memperhatikan komentar Anda, namun pada kesempatan ini kami tidak akan menerima tawaran Anda. Saya akan memberi tahu Anda alasannya. Saya tidak terkesan dengan Sheraton sejak kedatangan kami. Saya memesan hotel ini karena kami akan menikah pada hari Sabtu dan kami menginginkan hotel bintang 5 dan letaknya di antara hotel ini dan Intercontinental di Pondok Indah. Awalnya kami mengalami masalah saat membayar karena resepsionis Anda mengatakan kartu Anda ditolak dua kali. Ini memalukan karena saya tahu tidak ada masalah dengan kartu HSBC. Saya bilang oke dan membayar dengan kartu debit saya, menyatakan bahwa saya akan membicarakannya dengan HSBC. Saya berbicara dengan HSBC dan mengetahui bahwa ya, kartu itu ditolak tetapi bukan oleh HSBC, melainkan oleh mesin EDC Anda. Saya pergi keluar untuk membeli sampanye dan menggunakan kartu kredit HSBC, kartu itu berfungsi di toko yang saya kunjungi. Saya kembali ke dalam dan meminta staf resepsionis untuk mencoba lagi tetapi menggunakan mesin EDC lain, dan dia melakukannya. Kali ini berfungsi dengan sempurna dan resmi untuk barang lain yang mungkin saya inginkan. Hal ini tidak membuat saya senang karena dia bisa saja mencoba kartu tersebut di mesin lain pada pembayaran awal. Masalah berikutnya adalah layanan kamar Anda yang buruk malam itu. Tidak ada yang salah dengan layanan maupun kecepatan layanan. Kualitas makanan tidak sebanding dengan harga yang dibayarkan. Burgernya berminyak dan lembek, saya tidak menghabiskan semua pesanan makanan karena saya tidak bisa. Lalu sarapannya tidak enak. Pemanggang roti yang macet dan harus dipanaskan dua kali. Saya meminta teh Inggris, dan saya diberi secangkir air panas dan kantong teh! Ini layanan bintang 5? Makanan yang ditawarkan tidak sesuai dengan selera saya, tetapi hei, itu masalah saya, tetapi itu tercermin pada makanan yang saya makan tadi malam. Saya bertanya kepada petugas apakah mereka bisa membawakan sebotol sampanye saya, yang saya minta mereka taruh di kulkas semalaman, dengan 2 gelas sampanye dan menaruhnya di kamar saya siang ini dalam ember es. Ketika kami kembali ke hotel, saya menemukan botol itu di dalam ember es dengan es, luar biasa tetapi tidak ada gelas anggur, jadi kami harus minum dari gelas kaca untuk perayaan kami. Akhirnya, setelah berhenti di seluruh dunia, saya tidak mengerti bagaimana Anda membenarkan 5 bintang. Kamarnya memadai tetapi hanya itu saja, sudah usang.
